challenge.description: Welcome to Da Challenge! Please select the difficulty of the question you want to challenge.
challenge.hint_desc: You have unanswered questions, please complete all questions before submitting!
challenge.level_normal_desc: Only voices longer than a certain length will appear
challenge.q_multi_choice: Which stream does the following voice come from? (Multiple choice, 2 points per option)
challenge.q_negative: Which voice does not come from the following stream? (Single choice)
challenge.q_positive: Which voice comes from the following stream? (Single choice)
challenge.question_desc: Which stream does the following voice come from?
challenge.result_desc: Your score result is as follows
challenge.rule: One point for each correct answer, score reset for each wrong answer.
challenge.score0: “Did you mess up on purpose, or are you just an unlucky soul bound for hell? Got a problem?”
challenge.score1: “Are you a new viewer? Hello there! If you like this channel, remember to like, subscribe, and hit the notification bell~”
challenge.score100: “Are you Grey Herta's true love unicorn? Isn't that a mythical creature? No way...”
challenge.score20: “Welcome to the apprentice spy parrot team!”
challenge.score40: “Welcome to the full-time spy parrot team!”
challenge.score60: “Looks like you're a loyal fan of Grey Herta. Let Granny Herta give you a kiss! 5mamamama”
challenge.score80: “You did great! Let baby Herta give you a big hug!”
